channel.title: stand on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in stand on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: System Components
item.description: At a minimum, the system includes the cart, camera, microscope, 3D glasses, keyboard, and touchpad. However, the following is an example of a typical setup, including additional devices: 1 System – Receives video from the camera and displays 3D images. 2 Patient Bed – Holds the patient at a comfortable level. 3 Microscope stand – Suspends a microscope above the patient. 4 Camera – Captures 3D video. 5 Microscope – Magnifies the view of the camera.
